article.title: Bloody_Mary
article.paragraph: Wiktionarybloody maryBloody Marymay refer to:TOC right
article.heading: People

list.listitem: Mary I of England(15161558), Queen of England and Ireland, so called because of her execution of numerous Protestants

article.heading: Animals

list.listitem: "Bloody Mary", the nickname given to a skeleton ofNanotyrannusfound buried alongside aTriceratops
Mary (elephant), or Bloody Mary or Murderous Mary, an elephant that was infamously publicly hanged

article.heading: Arts and popular culture

list.listitem: Bloody Mary (folklore), a ghost said to appear in mirrors when a person repeats her name in front of the mirror and turn three times
